Cloud Confidence for Entrepreneurial Growth

February 27, 2017February 27, 2017james

Becoming an entrepreneur is a dream for many and an aspiration or goal you hear over top of 9-5 cubicles in everyday work stations.

But starting your own business isn’t all bright sunny days and miles of freedom. Often the entrepreneur will be met with a struggle around every corner.

“Being her own boss” is something that can eat away at your confidence is what Marsha discovered, when she left her 40 hour a week—and get all the overtime you can mindset safe-haven that only left her complacent in life.

Marsha found quickly that running a profitable and successful company is an incredibly trying experience that takes dedication, hard work, and sacrifice. She decided that she would be one of the entrepreneurs who are celebrated. Marsha was out to prove that entrepreneurs are the ones that get up every day and make the world a place of hope and free will for everyone else.

A similar article shows how the cloud helps entrepreneurs be prepared if disaster hits…

When Marsha discovered cloud file sharing and storage options she found a security blanket.

She found that when storing data in the cloud enabled her to secure access to data, using all devices such as tablet, smartphone and PC operating on the same system. This means entrepreneurs can maximize their efficiency by getting the access to information, using any device they have, at any given moment.

Marsha, being tight on startup cash found greater flexibility and reduced upfront costs making cloud technology a natural fit for her marketing shop, being that cloud simplifies the IT processes and accelerates the growth curve.

A simple situation with Marsha described the immense potential of cloud file sharing and storage with Guru Transfer:

  • She reached the client site to present a deal, but forgot to carry an important fact sheet that defines the success of the deal. Before leaving for the meeting she shifted the required data to the cloud which helped to access the data right at her fingertips at the client’s site.
  • Cloud file sharing and storage with Guru Transfer excludes the need for onsite servers—taking away with it operating costs and extra space required for storage of onsite servers.
  • The need for managing the network and information by devoted onsite staff diminishes.

For Marsha, this leads to improved cost efficiency.

Almost every entrepreneur shares the same experience as Marsha that it is practically not possible to execute business processes smoothly without a reliable network, computer and associated equipment.

It is often difficult for an average entrepreneur to keep its network up dated and maintain smooth functioning of software and other tools.

By making the move to the cloud, entrepreneurs need not to bank upon guesswork.

See LinkedIn where Guru Transfer founder, Rohit Srivastava tells us about delivering an immediate resolution to any kind of troubleshooting and repairing issue.

Just like for Marsha, this enables entrepreneurs to focus more on running their business smoothly, instead of devoting time in performing research on servers and building the infrastructure.

What Marsha liked best is her confidence with security issues that can often be an additional expense for an entrepreneur. But the improved productivity and big savings with Guru Transfer overcomes the risks. This helps entrepreneurs to focus on delivering the best services which facilitates the growth of their businesses and maximize efficiency.

Cloud File Sharing a Cure for College Blues

February 27, 2017james

Being away at college and staying in touch with the people you have left behind can cause student blues and feeling pretty well homesick.

Cindy left her large and close family in upstate New York for college in the UK, and realized she needed to give herself time within the university and the British environment to begin getting involved there.

For Cindy beginning life at college naturally generated both excitement and anxiety for many reasons, including the move. After all, just months ago she graduated from high school and with her new academic responsibilities and meeting new people certainly was stressful. But she knew she would be fine in due time.

To her surprise she found herself feeling homesick later in the academic year, after the Thanksgiving or semester break, and even at the start of her second academic year.

Then Cindy found the Guru Transfer cloud app perfect for families.

Families can take advantage of the ease at which you can share files, even video, using cloud storage to keep in touch with children who are away at college or family members who live out of state or abroad. Collaboration is much easier when families store their documentation in a cloud.

A related article tells how the cloud is lighting up students globally…

Individual family members can all upload their suggestions to the cloud to make decision making more of a collaborative effort. Cloud sharing and storage also comes in useful when on a family holiday too.

Consider sharing files where families can take advantage of the ease at which you can share even large files.  Using cloud storage to keep in touch with children who are away at college or family members who live out of state or abroad is quick and easy.

Rather than having to email multiple files individually or in groups to family members, which is both time consuming for the receiver and the sender, you can send them one email with a URL on it. This will give them full access to all the files you want them to see.

Accidents happen, theft occurs and loss of files or devices is an eventuality, but the severity of the outcome can be limited thanks to Guru Transfer cloud storage.

Family cloud storage and file sharing is fantastic for making sure that not only are everyone’s documents safe, but also that you can keep in touch with ease.

With Cindy’s big family back home the cloud keeps the other kids still at home happy, too.

Smartphones or tablets with access to your Guru Transfer cloud storage are a prime example of this. Through your cloud you can choose a film to play out to keep your children happy whilst on a long car journey.

Pop over to LinkedIn and see GuruTransfer.co founder, Rohit Srivastava explain more.

Cloud storage is the easiest way for Cindy away at college abroad to keep in touch with her parents and her dear Grandma, and to share pictures or video of the holiday happenings with everyone.

Automated backup can ensure that all your family’s devices backup to the same cloud with no manual effort required. Keep in mind that accidents do happen, theft occurs and loss of files or devices is an eventuality, but the severity of the outcome can be limited thanks to Guru Transfer cloud storage and file sharing.

Cloud File Sharing and Storage; Secured when Disaster Strikes

February 26, 2017February 26, 2017james

Cloud storage is not just the perfect file-sharing tool, but consider backup in the event of disaster.

We’ve recently seen evacuations underway in parts of San Jose, California, due to severe flooding and the Oroville Dam spillway crisis. This threatened cities and towns in Northern California, and it’s clear that the future will likely have many natural disaster threats yet to come.

The United States government last year issued 103 federal disaster declarations across the country.

And for those that suffered a loss in such an area, or a casualty or theft loss in another situation, those losses may qualify for tax deductions, according to the American Institute of CPAs, or AICPA.

What about recuperation from important data loss, such as all the files they had backed up in hard drives and zip drives?

That said, consider the case of Ellen and Ralph when their old beach front home burnt to the ground from faulty electrical wiring.  Ralph worked diligently following his retirement to renovate the home on stilts surrounded by acres and acres of rocks and wild sea oats hosting the surf. They’d planned to live their golden years there.

Think about your own situation and how may those files be retrieved when not just a flood or fire, but in any type disaster drowning or blowing away and flat out destroying those important devices you’ve been using for backup?

A casualty loss may be taken as an itemized deduction on Schedule A of Form 1040 for the year when the damage occurred (if a taxpayer doesn’t itemize, then they can’t even get the deduction).

“It’s not a grand giveaway,” said, a CPA and partner at large accounting firm in Louisiana, where flooding often occurs. But even with the best tax deductions for such a loss, still, how may you ever replace that important computer data?

Cloud storage is the perfect file-sharing tool, especially for multimedia and documents files that are too large to send by email.

Whether you need a reliable data backup solution, instant access to files wherever you are or a simple way to share files with colleagues and clients–or all of the above– there is a cloud storage service for you.

Another popular article shows readers how everyday people as well as entrepreneurs are heading to the cloud…

This gives not only everyday folks, but also small businesses like a mom and pop shops the flexibility of cloud storage and file sharing options. The benefits are instant storage for your everyday needs, sharing and storage for files to and from anywhere on the planet, especially secured during disaster.

Guru Transfer is a simple, secure and fast online storage provider.

The Guru Transfer app allows for files easily accessible from anywhere and at any time, even after a flood or fire or any other disaster you can imagine, and offers unlimited storage.

See LinkedIn where GuruTransfer.com founder, Rohit Srivastava explains that you will have 100 percent automated backups and the ability to sync multiple computers and mobile device apps.

In other words, no matter how nice the IRS is to you following a disaster, they won’t have a magic wand to restore the data in those damaged hard drives.

With Guru Transfer simply browse the files and folders on your mobile or smartphone and copy even large files as often as you’d like, and they are secured.

Cloud Classroom Replacing Contemporary Studies

February 26, 2017james

The cloud classroom is here!

“I love the benefit of having the ability to access my college research and other assignments, even while my girlfriend Fran and I take some well-deserved time away and head to the mountains for a few days. I can access all my data right from the cloud and delivered to me on my smartphone, and it’s great,” states Jonathan a California college student.

“However,” he added, “I did not intend to see my monthly payments rise terribly. I additionally stressed that the regards to usage can alter at any moment, and I would begin clambering to recuperate documents and relocate them from public servers. I began seeking a choice.”

Guru Transfer incorporates non-disruptively with existing SAAS systems so establishments can keep and take advantage of storage space to prevent problematic and expensive information movement that call for moving information or maintaining several variations of data.

The contemporary classroom is no more restricted to pencils, paper, and books. With pupils and professors producing riches of electronic data spread throughout numerous tools it currently calls for a brand-new means to maintain notes, files, and tasks from the lecture hall.

Students like Jonathon require an easy means to work together with peers on group work, research study information, or syncing files in actual time in between team participants. Teachers require a basic method to accumulate and share lecture material, without leaving tasks, beneficial files, or research study at risk to information loss.

Guru Transfer offers Jonathon more than simply a stress free trip to the mountains!

He’s experiencing financial savings, and he likewise has the full control that originates from sharing and storing files such as class discussions and also multimedia products and individual data on his own mobile devices, which really did not occur when he was keeping those files on public web servers.

A similar article tells us schools are excelling with cloud file sharing…

“Many thanks to Guru Transfer,” Jon says, “I can now maintain all my files in the cloud, even video and all my photos of Fran and I literally in the clouds at our favorite peak in the mountains. I have accessibility to them anytime on all my computer devices and also mobile phones without bothering with handling their storage area.”

Unlike most public cloud solutions Guru Transfer personal cloud devices place information into professors and also management’s control however with the very same simplicity of gaining access to and sharing abilities of prominent public cloud solutions just with none of the protection threats.

As an exclusive, on premise option, it provides IT full control over place as well as redundancy of info, while making it possible for individuals to independently share files with anybody and gain access to personal data from anywhere.

It’s both protected and also basic to sync and share files with pupils, various other professors, or staff in the college, or give read-only file gain access to via safe and secure shared web links that IT can conveniently take care of as well as check.

Visit LinkedIn where GuruTransfer.com founder, Rohit Srivastava tells us more about file transfer and cloud storage.  Guru Transfer is a suitable service for professors and also management staff to share data from another location and gain access to the information, and additionally assists college organizations to take monetary demands right into account.

Key Suggestions for Teacher Focus w/ Student Cloud File Sharing

February 22, 2017February 25, 2017james

I am seeing that cloud file sharing apps like Guru Transfer are entering into the mainstream collection of devices that educators make use of.

In any instance, it conserves time, boosts learning, and assists in better understanding with less complication.

One of the latest preferred of these teacher-focused devices is the Guru Transfer app, great for whether you’re a skilled expert educator, or a brand-new instructor simply beginning.

Below are some suggestions to assist you to improve responsibility. You want to develop a secure area for students, and be more in touch with moms and dads.

  • Anytime you present internet-based anything right into your students, and classroom, info security is crucial.

Any type of program you make use of must have integrated securities for surveillance and filtering system web content, along with maintaining your sources secure from harmful intent.

Acquaint on your own with the safety and security attributes of the programs you’re dealing with, and be specific that you’re using them for the purpose of learning.

  • Most prominent cloud file sharing apps permit you to maintain a schedule, web links, projects, and sources arranged in one location.

This can have several advantages for both you and your students, because you have 24/7 accessibility to the network and there’s never a way out for students to say things like, “My dog ate my homework!”

When out for a prolonged duration, students who missed out on classes because of sickness or injury may stay up to date with their classwork and also research.

A related article tells readers how excited students are becoming over cloud file sharing…

  • On-line research entry maintains students from having the ability to make use of the “I did it yet I shed it!” justification.

When a lesson has actually been finished, your students ought to have the ability to submit the lessons, and you’ll have a time-date stamp for entry.

When a mom or dad calls you upset since their kid stated “they aren’t sure why they obtained a failing or poor grade,” you can clarify that the job was sent days late, and have evidence to back it up.

  • When helping with a team task via your cloud area, you can see who has actually been visiting and working on it.

For more, hop on over to LinkedIn where GuruTransfer.com CEO, Rohit Srivastava tells us more about an on-line cloud file sharing.

As a teacher, you likewise are offered important understanding right into your pupil’s research behaviors. I mean that you will understand things like who is getting their work done when they first get home from school, as well as who finished a project an hour or so before class started.

  • If you’re utilizing a class social networks program, or Twitter or Facebook, you can keep track of communications in between students and monitor if necessary.

Also if a pupil realizes their remark was out of line, foul, or unacceptable and deleted it, the majority of networks maintain a record of all activity helping you to more closely monitor communication.

This provides you the possibility to see exactly what is taking place behind the scenes–pupils frequently act in a different way when being looked after. The students act more respectable and mature when being monitored by teachers.

In conclusion, just remember that similar to any kind of interaction device, cloud file sharing in the classroom depends on being receptive and mindful.
